headline: Is It Time To Reassess Northern Trust (NTRS) After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Northern Trust is still reasonably priced after a strong run, this article will walk you through what the current share price could mean for long term investors. The stock closed at US$140.38, with a 4.1% decline over the last 7 days and a 5.6% decline over 30 days, while the 1 year return sits at 27.8% and the 3 year and 5 year returns are 64.3% and 65.4% respectively. Recent coverage has focused on Northern Trust's position within diversified financials and how...

headline: 3 Value Stocks That Fall Short
summary: Value investing has produced some of the world’s most famous investing billionaires, including Warren Buffett, David Einhorn, and Seth Klarman, who built their fortunes by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.
